section.para: The function performs an enum query and rewrites the Request-URI with the result of the query. See for more information.
Meaning of the parameters is as follows:

listitem.para: suffix - Suffix to be appended to the domain name.
service - Service string to be used in the service field.

example.title: enum_query usage

section.para: Checks if the user part of from URI an E164 number of the form +[0-9]{2,15}. Returns 1 if yes and -1 if not.
